title: pseudonymised
extract: Pseudonymised Data. Pseudonymisation takes the most identifying fields within a database and replaces them with artificial identifiers, or pseudonyms. ... The purpose is to render the data record less identifying and therefore reduce concerns with data sharing and data retention.
extract_html: Pseudonymised Data. Pseudonymisation takes the most identifying fields within a database and replaces them with artificial identifiers, or pseudonyms. ... The purpose is to render the data record less identifying and therefore reduce concerns with data sharing and data retention.
